EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Aviation Portfolio, an independent, private aviation intelligence company, has become a valuable resource to corporate flight departments.
And to illustrate the value of our support and protection, we are offering a COMPLIMENTARY historical audit during the month of October.
Craig Ross, the former COO of Marquis Jet, founded Aviation Portfolio in 2011. The company currently employs a staff of five and has offices in California and New York.
May we schedule five minutes to discuss?
Best Regards,
Luke Hatfield Aviation Portfolio, LLC www.aviationportfolio.com
